author: flordi
root_title: Tú también puedes colaborar / You can also collaborate
body:
![Earn Money(2).png](https://files.peakd.com/file/peakd-hive/achimmertens/AKAr2pK3Nw7DhpREEcx2yQ1dSe3BQ4KKDFLKAWjNL9Ni952afaaKuqX68gTapsB.png)

[Fuente](https://ecency.com/hive-154303/@advertisingbot2/hive-marketing-campaign-240621-week-25-for-)
La comunidad hivemarketing tiene una iniciativa bonita: está pendiente de los Hivers que están realizando algún trabajo en beneficio de su comunidad para promocionarlo y a los primero 10 Hivers que colocan la publicidad en su post les da un incentivo de 2 Hives. Esta semana este es el texto que debemos compartir:
The hivemarketing community has a nice initiative: it is aware of the Hivers who are doing some work to benefit their community to promote it and the first 10 Hivers who place the advertising in their post are given an incentive of 2 Hives. This week this is the text we must share:
"Please follow @adaezeinchrist because she organized a gathering for widows and less privileged individuals, providing them with food and clothes in Nigeria"
Sí lo deseas, puedes seguirme por mis redes sociales /If you want you may follow me on my social networks


? [Facebook](https://www.facebook.com/flor.pasquier)
https://images.ecency.com/DQmaeJZCBoyTuijuXt1HGccQuR2CN6CGYS7f1qSbA8LuDgs/firma_flor2.jpg

author: hermaryrc
root_title: Concurso de karaoke VDC Semana #6 | Paquita la del barrio "Vivo contenta" | By @hermaryrc
body:
<center>

<center>
![1719106778927.jpg](https://images.hive.blog/DQmR2ivxKpjiyABG3md8x3V7WY6AQkQU5zThFiSb7cR4BNQ/1719106778927.jpg)
</center>

***<center>Hola querida comunidad de Hive y VDC, como están? Espero que excelente, el día de hoy les comparto mi primera participación en este gran concurso que nos trae el gran talento que pueden tener muchas personas, de verdad me gustó bastante apoyar y estar acá presente! Agradezco a @sayury por la invitación.</center>***

***<center>La canción con la que decidí participar se llama "Vivo contenta" de Paquita la del barrio. Espero sea de su agrado y disfruten! </center>***




[![](https://ipfs-3speak.b-cdn.net/ipfs/bafybeihgaecok2sba63z46xwtzmjkqvism2qckovxnmzpreewm5ecynupe/)](https://3speak.tv/watch?v=hermaryrc/eaapflcf)

▶️ [Watch on 3Speak](https://3speak.tv/watch?v=hermaryrc/eaapflcf)

</center>

---

> ***Hello dear Hive and VDC community, how are you? I hope excellent, today I share with you my first participation in this great contest that brings us the great talent that many people can have, I really enjoyed supporting and being here present! Thanks to @sayury for the invitation.***

> ***The song I decided to participate with is called "Vivo contenta" by Paquita la del barrio. I hope you like it and enjoy it!*** 

<center>https://www.youtube.com/watch?v=uFQrp_gseqE</center>

# <center>Letra de la canción / Song lyrics</center>

<center>Amo la experiencia que la vida
Me ha regalado
Con el paso de los años
Yo busco crecer a cada instante
Cada día que vivo es un peldaño</center>

<center>Yo no me peleo con la edad
La verdad, el tiempo a mí
No me preocupa
Yo no ando contando calendarios
En eso mi mente no se ocupa</center>

<center>Yo disfruto la vida con lluvia con sol
Del amor soy amante
Si tropiezo y me caigo, me pongo de pie
Y nuevamente adelante
Guardo lo que tenga que guardar
Tiro a la basura
Lo que no es importante</center>

<center>Yo no vivo angustiada
Del paso del tiempo, eso no me atormenta
Yo no forzó mi cuerpo con la zapatilla de la cenicienta
Yo no cambiaria esta edad
Yo con mis años
Vivo contenta</center>

<center>Yo disfruto la vida con lluvia con sol
Del amor soy amante
Si tropiezo y me caigo me pongo de pie
Y nuevamente adelante
Guardo lo que tenga que guardar
Y tiro a la basura
Lo que no es importante</center>

<center>Yo no vivo angustiada
Del paso del tiempo, eso no me atormenta
Yo no forzó mi cuerpo con la zapatilla de la cenicienta
Yo no cambiaria esta edad
Yo con mis años
Vivo contenta</center>

<center>
![IMG_20240524_163950_167.jpg](https://images.hive.blog/DQmRwis9sgVTb9uoeaUu2349H9VQCzy2EQ5Y5sHnCgZwyPU/IMG_20240524_163950_167.jpg)
</center>


<center>"Please follow @adaezeinchrist because she organized a gathering for widows and less privileged individuals, providing them with food and clothes in Nigeria"</center>


<center>https://images.hive.blog/0x0/https://files.peakd.com/file/peakd-hive/threespeak-es/RlWpfCcf-Sin-tC3ADtulo-12.gif</center>

<center>https://images.hive.blog/768x0/https://images.ecency.com/DQmcCsCbErWxsmzuyUpi5nKNWBVCpQ86shi8rSoc9786hRX/inshot_20231027_073535085.jpg</center>


---

author: scarletgrissel
root_title: Mi primera publicación en Hive.blog / My first post on Hive.blog [Spa - Eng]
body:
-
https://images.ecency.com/DQmP9d8mH7UcEzqqEsENs7496VrGBpSHX5bEShrpHYNXoX9/foto_perfil.png

Hola, comunidad, esta es mi primera publicación en Hive.blog. Estoy acá porque mi sueño desde que era chirriquitica es el de ser cantante profesiona. Yo hago tiktok siempre cantando y una amiga de mi mamá (@dodokan) le habló de esta red y ella estuvo investigando por acá y por allá hasta que vio que es un sitio serio con gente seria y me dio permiso para inscribirme..
> Hello community, this is my first post on Hive.blog. I'm here because my dream since I was a very very little girl is to be a professional singer. I always sing on TikTok and a friend of my mom (@dodokan) told her about this network and she was investigating here and there until she saw that it is a serious site with serious people and gave me permission to sign up.
Mi nombre es Scarlet Grissel Vargas Cardozo, soy venezolana y vivo en Villa de Cura, estado Aragua, Venezuela. Tengo diiez años y lo que más me gusta de todo es cantar. Otras cosas que me gustan son hacer las uñas (manicure y pedicure) y me gustan mucho los perros. En casa tenemos tres: Sacha y sus dos hijos, Gruñón y Peluche. Así que somos ocho en mi familia con mis dos hermanos, papá y mamá.
> My name is Scarlet Grissel Vargas Cardozo, I am Venezuelan and I live in Villa de Cura, Aragua state, Venezuela. I am ten years old and what I like most of all is singing. Other things I like are doing nails (manicure and pedicure) and I really like dogs. At home we have three: Sacha and her two children, Grumpy and Peluche. So there are eight of us in my family with my two brothers, dad and mom..
https://images.ecency.com/DQmQP4nhNELFfyExb1onu5G4S5SwVgwJNESiaYmR77bKZ1T/image.png
--
Ella es Sacha / She is Sacha

https://images.ecency.com/DQmeYFterL386F7cAN9icp7iMVUA7mmpVeZqWHWQoerEvqE/image.png

Mi familia/ My family

@dodokan nos dijo que acá hay muchos músicos y muchos buenos cantantes y que puedo ir aprendiendo un poquito de cada uno. Si son muchos y aprendo de cada uno, pues aprenderé mucho y seré una muy buena cantante cuando crezca.
>@dodokan told us that there are many musicians and many good singers here and that I can learn a little from each one. If there are many and I learn from each one, then I will learn a lot and I will be a very good singer when I grow up
https://images.ecency.com/DQmSiSGPDa8byLkvtgbCZLoYvThYsA8pvcWSz3PnA2ECP2z/logo_3speak.png

Apenas mi papá logre abrirme la cuenta en 3speak (que no ha podido abrirlaporque internet está muy lento) podré comenzar a publicar mis canciones y espero que todo salga bien. Hasta luego.
>As soon as my dad manages to open my 3speak account (he hasn't been able to open it because the internet is very slow) I will be able to start publishing my songs and I hope everything goes well. See you later.
"Please follow @adaezeinchrist because she organized a gathering for widows and less privileged individuals, providing them with food and clothes in Nigeria"

https://images.ecency.com/DQmbpWqESs9KQpbrb6d3a1h5qnt9uS67sw9sJruTHZGJSLG/sin_t_tulo.png

author: barbyjr
root_title: Farsali Serum for our skincare routine. 💙🧖🏻 [Esp-Eng]
body:
<liketuimages>
<center>
![APeVB490anCGNR1P_20240616_234241_141.webp](https://cdn.liketu.com/media/barbyjr/images/APeVB490anCGNR1P_20240616_234241_141/APeVB490anCGNR1P_20240616_234241_141.webp)
![6bVpKIoVtH3VOCBf_20240616_234844_422.webp](https://cdn.liketu.com/media/barbyjr/images/6bVpKIoVtH3VOCBf_20240616_234844_422/6bVpKIoVtH3VOCBf_20240616_234844_422.webp)
![Cjg8TRPPNfOHkC9E_20240616_234545_550.webp](https://cdn.liketu.com/media/barbyjr/images/Cjg8TRPPNfOHkC9E_20240616_234545_550/Cjg8TRPPNfOHkC9E_20240616_234545_550.webp)
![UCcCDougiy4yLYYN_20240616_234405_731.webp](https://cdn.liketu.com/media/barbyjr/images/UCcCDougiy4yLYYN_20240616_234405_731/UCcCDougiy4yLYYN_20240616_234405_731.webp)
![4J589oVyRWMrq3my_20240616_234705_431.webp](https://cdn.liketu.com/media/barbyjr/images/4J589oVyRWMrq3my_20240616_234705_431/4J589oVyRWMrq3my_20240616_234705_431.webp)
![Hzq7yFq8bQ0I40GH_20240616_235225_984.webp](https://cdn.liketu.com/media/barbyjr/images/Hzq7yFq8bQ0I40GH_20240616_235225_984/Hzq7yFq8bQ0I40GH_20240616_235225_984.webp)
![9TaZW4FJfsjStvyT_20240616_235010_942.webp](https://cdn.liketu.com/media/barbyjr/images/9TaZW4FJfsjStvyT_20240616_235010_942/9TaZW4FJfsjStvyT_20240616_235010_942.webp)
![xamikuhTD4TivZwi_20240616_235105_203.webp](https://cdn.liketu.com/media/barbyjr/images/xamikuhTD4TivZwi_20240616_235105_203/xamikuhTD4TivZwi_20240616_235105_203.webp)
</center>
</liketuimages>

***Hola amigos 👋🏻 espero se encuentren muy bien, feliz y bendecido fin de semana para todos, me alegra estar por acá de nuevo con ustedes, en está oportunidad les comparto mi experiencia usando los sérum Farsali. Los sérum se han vuelto indispensable para nuestra rutina y está línea está completa para tener una piel muy bonita y saludable.***

***FARSÁLI es un aliado perfecto para el cuidado personal, con fórmulas cuidadosamente seleccionadas que realzan la belleza natural. Comprometidos con ingredientes seguros, libres de crueldad animal y de origen ético.***

***Tipos de sérum Farsali:*** 

***✨24 Elixir (Dorado): esencia de colágeno, aceite hidratante, blanqueamiento, reduce poros, reafirmante, antiarrugas y brinda luminosidad a la piel. Se sugiere aplicar por la mañana y noche.***

***✨Skintune Blur (Verde): sérum híbrido que difumina suavemente la piel, reduce la aparición de poros e imperfecciones.***

***✨ Colágeno Farsali Rose gold elixir (Blanco): humectante ligero con potentes efectos para combatir el envejecimiento y es el producto ideal para usar de día.***

***✨Unicorn Essence (Morado): ayuda a proteger la piel contra radicales libres, mientras lo podemos usar como prebase o primer antes de nuestro maquillaje.***

***✨Volcanic elixir (Negro): Ayuda en la regeneración de piel nueva y sana. Puede ser utilizado en proceso de acné y también ayuda disminuir las cicatrices.***

***✨Liquid glass (Plata): funciona para preparar la piel antes del maquillaje, se puede usar antes o después del hidratante, esto ayudará a conseguir un acabado luminoso.***

***✨Volcanic elixir (Rojo): es un híbrido que difumina suavemente la piel, reduce la apariencia de imperfecciones y deja un efecto de ajuste fino y brillante.***

***✨Suero youth elixir (Rosa): ayuda a que la piel se vea visiblemente más joven y saludable, atenuando líneas finas de expresión y manchas. Se puede usar en las mañanas o en las noches.***

***Es una línea completa de sérum para el mantener nuestro rostro saludable, por los momentos estoy usando solo 3 y me ha ido muy bien con ellos, se notan los resultados en poco tiempo. Me encantaría tenerlos todos por sus múltiples beneficios.***

***Bueno amigos espero sea de su agrado y les pueda ayudar está recomendación, muchas gracias por haber leído mi post 🙏🏻éxitos y bendiciones para todos! Hasta la próxima.***

***Todas las fotos son de mi autoría, captadas con mi teléfono 📲 LGK42.***

> ***English:*** 

> ***Hello friends 👋🏻 I hope you are well, happy and blessed week for everyone, I am glad to be here with you again, on this occasion I share my experience using Farsali serums. Serums have become essential for our routine and this line is complete to have very beautiful and healthy skin.***

> ***FARSÁLI is a perfect ally for personal care, with carefully selected formulas that enhance natural beauty. Committed to safe, cruelty-free and ethically sourced ingredients.***

> ***Types of Farsali serum:***

> ***✨24 Elixir (Gold): collagen essence, moisturizing oil, whitening, reduces pores, firming, anti-wrinkle and provides luminosity to the skin. It is suggested to apply in the morning and night.***

> ***✨Skintune Blur (Green): hybrid serum that gently blurs the skin, reduces the appearance of pores and imperfections.***

> ***✨ Collagen Farsali Rose gold elixir (White): light moisturizer with powerful anti-aging effects and is the ideal product to use during the day.***

> ***✨Unicorn Essence (Purple): helps protect the skin against free radicals, while we can use it as a prebase or primer before our makeup.***

> ***✨Volcanic elixir (Black): Helps in the regeneration of new and healthy skin. It can be used in the acne process and also helps reduce scars.***

> ***✨Liquid glass (Silver): works to prepare the skin before makeup, it can be used before or after moisturizer, this will help achieve a luminous finish.***

> ***✨Volcanic elixir (Red): is a hybrid that gently blurs the skin, reduces the appearance of imperfections and leaves a fine-tuned and shiny effect.***

> ***✨Youth elixir serum (Pink): helps the skin look visibly younger and healthier, reducing fine lines of expression and blemishes. It can be used in the morning or at night.***

> ***It is a complete line of serum to keep our face healthy, at the moment I am only using 3 and I have done very well with them, the results are noticeable in a short time. I would love to have them all because of their many benefits.***

> ***Well friends, I hope you like it and this recommendation can help you, thank you very much for reading my post 🙏🏻 success and blessings for all! Until next time.***

> ***All photos are my own, captured with my phone 📲 LGK42.***

"Please follow @adaezeinchrist because she organized a gathering for widows and less privileged individuals, providing them with food and clothes in Nigeria"

---

For the best experience view this post on [Liketu](https://liketu.com/@barbyjr/farsali-serum-for-our-skincare-routine-esp-eng)

author: luisfe
root_title: Hive Music Festival Week 88 Round 1 Cover by @luisfe
body:
[![](https://ipfs-3speak.b-cdn.net/ipfs/bafybeicprhadnfpbfm7opxglwniwiw57ex2fwypwdvgdvxescevozhbk2y/)](https://3speak.tv/watch?v=luisfe/isztjnfm) ▶️ [Watch on 3Speak](https://3speak.tv/watch?v=luisfe/isztjnfm)
---
--
https://images.ecency.com/DQmRLztx3iGuEjTeq7yq1so2BCe238RDu4r5rsWPLMeCmeK/sin_t_tulo.png

- *(Esta es una publicación bilingüe, puedes ver la versión en castellano al final del post)*
--
Greetings, community of music lovers. With only two weeks to go until we reach week 90, Hive Music Festival calls us again, to freely select a musical theme, rehearse it, perform it and share it.
This week I bring you another memory song: "Cachita" which I heard performed by the Aragón Orchestra I like it a lot and I think you might like it. It is a very happy song, from the cha-cha-chá era 'I didn't even think about being born when that'. The Virgin of Caridad del Cobre is the Patroness of Cuba. The Cubans affectionately call her “Cachita” and when they name a girl Caridad in honor of the Virgin, it will not take long for them to start calling her “Cachita.” This song is written or dedicated to a girl who is called Cachita and who is very pretty.
Lyrics of the song Listen to me “Cachita” I have a rumbita So that you dance it like I dance pretty girl My pretty “Cachita” The hot rumba is better than the son Watch them break I already like the maracas And the one with the timpani They already want to riot The Frenchman has fun like this And also the German And the Irishman is happy And even the Muslim And if even an Englishman dances They get into the commotion And so that they go crazy Even a Japanese

https://images.ecency.com/DQmdEFNi1YpujDyWycN9USEEUydPQ5S8t8tVnHMa4dfMVu1/separador.png

Versión en castellano

Disfruten el video con la interpretación original de "Cachita" con la Orquesta Aragón
https://www.youtube.com/watch?v=DvsX2beij_g

Saludos, comunidad de amantes de la música. A sólo dos semanas para llegar a la semana 90, nos convoca nuevamente Hive Music Festival, a seleccionar un tema musical libremente, ensayarlo, interpretarlo y compartirlo.
Esta semana les traigo otra canción del recuerdo: "Cachita" la que escuché interpretada por la Orquesta Aragón Me gusta mucho y creo que a ustedes les puede gustar. Es una canción muy alegre, de la época del cha-cha-chá ‘ ni pensaba yo en nacer cuando eso ‘. La virgen de la Caridad del Cobre es la Patrona de Cuba. Los cubanos la llaman por cariño “Cachita” y cuando a una niña le ponen de nombre Caridad en honor a la Virgen, no tardarán mucho en comenzar a decirle “Cachita” Esta canción es escrita o dedicada a una chica a quien dicen Cachita y que es muy bonita.
Letra de la canción Oyeme cachita Tengo una rumbita Ta′ que tu la bailes como bailo yo Muchahcha bonita Mi linda cachita La rumba caliente es mejor que el son Oyeme cachita Tengo una rumbita Pa' que tu la bailes como bailo yo Muchacha bonita Mi linda Cachita La rumba caliente es mejor son Mira que se rompan Ya de gusto las maracas Y el de los timbales Ya se quiere alborotar Se divierte así el francés Y también el alemán Y se alegra el irlandés Y hasta el musulmán Y si baila hasta un inglÉs Se les mete el alboroto Y pa′ que se vuelva loco Hasta un japonés
[Fuente]( https://www.musixmatch.com/es/letras/Rafael-Hernandez/Cachita)
La letra de esta canción es de la autoría de Rafael Hernandez, auitor también de otros grandes éxitos como “Lamento borincano” , “Campanitas de cristal” y “Amor no me quieras tanto”
https://images.ecency.com/DQmdEFNi1YpujDyWycN9USEEUydPQ5S8t8tVnHMa4dfMVu1/separador.png

Muchas gracias por visitar mi blog, escuchar mi video y leer mi post. Espero que esta sea una semana llena de cosas buenas para ti y tu familia. Dios te bendiga.
Thank you very much for visiting my blog, watching my video and reading my post. I hope this be a week full of good things for you and your family. God bless you,
Your visit to my blog is very important to me, I hope you liked my musical work and leave with the intention of returning..
Tu visita a mi blog es muy importante para mí. Espero que te haya gustado mi trabajo musical y te vayas con la intención de regresar.
"Please follow @adaezeinchrist because she organized a gathering for widows and less privileged individuals, providing them with food and clothes in Nigeria"

Si lo deseas, puedes seguirme en mi canal de 3Speak
If you wish you may follow me in my 3Speak channel

author: sayury
root_title: Concurso Karaoke VDC. Semana 6.  "Como un día domingo" (As a Sunday) cover by @sayury
body:
[![](https://ipfs-3speak.b-cdn.net/ipfs/bafybeid3akdhueryinyutyh25rgdxz4a34aaflottgypenswof23r6vhwa/)](https://3speak.tv/watch?v=sayury/mnsbtchh) ▶️ [Watch on 3Speak](https://3speak.tv/watch?v=sayury/mnsbtchh)
https://images.ecency.com/DQmbtU7NrcWaUnYUT4wmZBnzj8nZDkAeB6EGN1Ahx65Xto4/portada_karaoke_6.png

En este post he utilizado tanto el idioma inglés como el castellano. Puedes leer su versión en español al final del mismo
Greetings, community of music lovers, in this week 6 of the only karaoke contest on our website, I want to share with you my version of the song “Like a Sunday Day”, very successful in the voices of Antonieta and Paul Anka. This song was recorded in 1986
I would like to invite two Hivers who I think would like to participate in this fun space and give free rein to their imagination.
They are:

@isbelhive
@princessbusayo

Lyrics
I need you to talk see you in any way to laugh and talk and walk facing the wind I need to breathe that air that surrounds you On my skin I want to have the same sun that tans you. I need to caress you again and again to be able to feel the joy of existing. I no longer want to live a meaningless feeling I need to discover the emotion of being with you see the sun rise and see life blossom like a Sunday Keep in mind that there is still time everything is due to emotion Keep in mind that we still have time and let the voice of the heart talk

♩🎶🎵🎤♩https://images.ecency.com/DQmV7WLUhQumBxh1FWRT43Ab2EqksnGiUwC49RW2hTrHYDJ/a_separador_sayury.png♩🎶🎵🎤

VERSIÓN EN CASTELLANO

https://www.youtube.com/watch?v=MTAjEiS7Szs

Saludos, comunidad de amantes de la música, en esta semana 6 del único concurso de karaoke de nuestra web, deseo compartir con ustedes mi versión de la canción “Como un día domingo”. Muy exitosa en las voces de Antonieta y Paul Anka. Esta canción fue grabada en 1986
Deseo invitar a participar a dos Hivers a los que pienso que les gustará participar en este divertido espacio y dar rienda a su imaginación. Ellos son:

@isbelhive
@princessbusayo

La canción que compartiré con ustedes esta semana…
Letra de la canción
Te necesito para hablar verte de cualquier manera para reir y conversar y caminar de cara al viento Necesito respirar, de ese aire que te rodea En la piel quiero tener,el mismo sol que te broncea necesito acariciarte y otra vez poder sentir la alegria de existir Ya no quiero más vivir un sentimiento sin sentido Necesito descubrir la emoción de estar contigo Ver el sol amanecer y ver la vida florecer Como un día domingo Ten en cuenta que aún hay tiempo todo queda por cuenta de la emoción ten en cuenta que aun nos queda tiempo y dejar hablar la voz del corazón

[Fuente]( https://www.albumcancionyletra.com/como-un-dia-domingo_de_antonieta-y-paul-anka___237969.aspx)
♩🎶🎵🎤♩https://images.ecency.com/DQmV7WLUhQumBxh1FWRT43Ab2EqksnGiUwC49RW2hTrHYDJ/2a_separador_sayury.png♩🎶🎵🎤

author: cashheaven
root_title: Battle Mage Secrets: Lost in Magic, train your aim with Astral Entity
body:
![BATTLE MAGE SECRETS LOST MAGIC](https://images.hive.blog/0x0/https://files.peakd.com/file/peakd-hive/splinterlands/23xA2LL1dNpWnRRsjqGhi5sYSxTjUSunFWKr1nMKJWqKp71xbtwukHujrFy5rofXLZUJT.png) This week, I'm sharing my game in Lost Magic ruleset using Astral Entity. ![LOST MAGIC weekly challenge](https://files.peakd.com/file/peakd-hive/cashheaven/23wMzGDdA9DuDU9JeyJCG9Zf83EYtozNtc5kAVe9HSqXDd7Hwtm3mxwkjqoNDomTBAfjM.png) You can check out this [BATTLE MAGE SECRETS Weekly Challenge link](https://peakd.com/hive-13323/@splinterlands/battle-mage-secrets-weekly-challenge-sffnvx) if you also want to participate. ---
**Ruleset:** *Lost Magic* *Heavy Hitters* *Super Sneak* **Mana Cap:** *37* **Elements:** *All except Dragon*
![Game Modifications](https://files.peakd.com/file/peakd-hive/cashheaven/23vho3T9rYba5ppWTmZdDuEg4vZLYE8J9Tw5N8KWxRUaPvjCiVPFU8xkUayoUp9nkmtqj.png)
This is a [Lost Magic](https://splintercards.com/rulesets.php?rs=18) ruleset game so Monsters with Magic attack may not be used in battles. Don't use Magic Reflect monsters or summoners. Focus on high speed and abilities like Flying, Dodge, Blind. Thorns and Shield are the key in this ruleset.
![Lost Magic](https://splintercards.com/media/ruleset/lost-magic.png)
This is a [Heavy Hitters](https://splintercards.com/rulesets.php?rs=13) ruleset game so All Monsters have the Knock Out ability. Use a monster with Stun ability. There is a 50% chance that your monster with Stun will be able to stun enemy monsters, but if successful, all your monsters will deal double damage to that stunned opponent.
![Heavy Hitters](https://splintercards.com/media/ruleset/heavy-hitters.png)
This is a [Super Sneak](https://splintercards.com/rulesets.php?rs=28) ruleset game so All Melee attack Monsters have the Sneak ability. Choose a summoner that increases/reduces Melee attack or Mylor. Keep a monster with Shield, Retaliate or Thorns in the last position.
![Super Sneak](https://splintercards.com/media/ruleset/super-sneak.png)
--- ![Let the battle begin!](https://files.peakd.com/file/peakd-hive/cashheaven/23uEz8Fp7jFzwhPi2G9C8ZMgtrpRsTMQFrC4bGdFVdzUFrWdhJ95NvJnoKLv9ouiM7cBu.png) You may also [watch battle here](https://splinterlands.com/?p=battle&id=sl_e3c630f2e62d8f6cde28f0dd55d3790b). ---
Summoner: **Astral Entity** Abilities: All enemy monsters lose -2 armor All friendly monsters gain [Dodge](https://splintercards.com/abilities.php?ab=34) ability All friendly monsters gain [Resurrect](https://splintercards.com/abilities.php?ab=13) ability
![Astral Entity](https://d36mxiodymuqjm.cloudfront.net/cards_by_level/chaos/Astral%20Entity_lv4.png) ---
Pos 1 Monster: **Riftwing** Abilities: [Flying](https://splintercards.com/abilities.php?ab=2) - Has an increased chance of evading Melee or Ranged attacks from Monsters who do not have the Flying ability +25% chance of evading. [Scavenger](https://splintercards.com/abilities.php?ab=37) - Gains 1 max health each time any monster dies [Backfire](https://splintercards.com/abilities.php?ab=91) - If an enemy misses this Monster with an attack, the attacker takes 2 damage [Headwinds](https://splintercards.com/abilities.php?ab=30) - Reduces the Ranged attack of all enemy Monsters. -1 to ranged attack, it cannot be less than 1
![Riftwing](https://d36mxiodymuqjm.cloudfront.net/cards_by_level/chaos/Riftwing_lv10_gold.png) ---
Pos 2 Monster: **Harklaw** Abilities: [Shield](https://splintercards.com/abilities.php?ab=5) - Reduced damage from Melee and Ranged attacks. Attack damage gets halved (rounded up), except attack 1 which deals 0 damage Reduces the Thorns damage to 1 Cancel Redemption damage [Immunity](https://splintercards.com/abilities.php?ab=52) - This monster is immune to negative status effects [Demoralize](https://splintercards.com/abilities.php?ab=28) - Reduces the Melee attack of all enemy Monsters -1 to melee attack, it cannot be less than 1
![Harklaw](https://d36mxiodymuqjm.cloudfront.net/cards_by_level/reward/Harklaw_lv4.png) ---
Pos 3 Monster: **Venator Kinjo** Abilities: [Reflection Shield](https://splintercards.com/abilities.php?ab=95) - This Monster is immune to all indirect, or reflected damage. That means that it will not take damage from Blast, Thorns, Return Fire, or Magic Reflect [Camouflage](https://splintercards.com/abilities.php?ab=89) - This Monster cannot be targeted for attacks unless it's in the first position [Immunity](https://splintercards.com/abilities.php?ab=52) - This monster is immune to negative status effects [Slow](https://splintercards.com/abilities.php?ab=21) - Reduces the Speed of all enemy Monsters [Amplify](https://splintercards.com/abilities.php?ab=87) - Increases Magic Reflect, Return Fire, and Thorns damage to all enemy monsters by 1
![Venator Kinjo](https://d36mxiodymuqjm.cloudfront.net/cards_by_level/reward/Venator%20Kinjo_lv4.png) ---
Pos 4 Monster: **Pelacor Deceiver** Abilities: [Flying](https://splintercards.com/abilities.php?ab=2) - Has an increased chance of evading Melee or Ranged attacks from Monsters who do not have the Flying ability +25% chance of evading. [Backfire](https://splintercards.com/abilities.php?ab=91) - If an enemy misses this Monster with an attack, the attacker takes 2 damage [Retaliate](https://splintercards.com/abilities.php?ab=8) - When hit with a Melee attack, Monsters with Retaliate have a chance of attacking their attacker 50% chance of activation. Possibility of chain.
![Pelacor Deceiver](https://d36mxiodymuqjm.cloudfront.net/cards_by_level/reward/Pelacor%20Deceiver_lv10_gold.png) ---
Pos 5 Monster: **Cursed Windeku** Abilities: [Thorns](https://splintercards.com/abilities.php?ab=59) - When hit with a Melee attack, does damage back to the attacker Has an upper cap of 2 [Heal](https://splintercards.com/abilities.php?ab=7) - Restores a portion of the Monster's health each round Restores 1/3 of the max health, rounded down. [Slow](https://splintercards.com/abilities.php?ab=21) - Reduces the Speed of all enemy Monsters
![Cursed Windeku](https://d36mxiodymuqjm.cloudfront.net/cards_by_level/chaos/Cursed%20Windeku_lv8_gold.png) ---
Pos 6 Monster: **Ever-Hungry Skull** Abilities: [Flying](https://splintercards.com/abilities.php?ab=2) - Has an increased chance of evading Melee or Ranged attacks from Monsters who do not have the Flying ability +25% chance of evading. [Thorns](https://splintercards.com/abilities.php?ab=59) - When hit with a Melee attack, does damage back to the attacker Has an upper cap of 2 [Return Fire](https://splintercards.com/abilities.php?ab=42) - When hit with a Ranged attack, Monsters with Return Fire will return reduced damage back to their attacker. Damage returned is equal to damage of attacker divided by 2, rounded up.
![Ever-Hungry Skull](https://d36mxiodymuqjm.cloudfront.net/cards_by_level/reward/Ever-Hungry%20Skull_lv10.png) --- Now that Rebellion edition is here, do you think there's a stronger line up in this Game Modification? Comment down below. You may also [watch battle here](https://splinterlands.com/?p=battle&id=sl_e3c630f2e62d8f6cde28f0dd55d3790b). --- Hope you learned something from my game and how I came up with this lineup. What would you have done differently given the same ruleset, mana cap and active elements? Let us know by dropping a comment. --- Want to play Splinterlands with me? [Play with me](https://splinterlands.com?ref=cashheaven) Make passive income by renting out your card collection in [peakmonsters](peakmonsters.com) Earn on your blogs. Blog with us here in [Hive](https://peakd.com/register?ref=cashheaven) Earn passive income by sharing your internet bandwidth with [Honeygain](https://r.honeygain.me/JONAS2EC92) Earn while you search the internet with [Presearch](https://presearch.com/signup?rid=4389909) If you are looking for a charity to donate to, please consider [Food for Hungry Minds](https://foodforhungryminds.org/donate/). ###### Card images are owned and open-sourced by Splinterlands.io
Still need help with Excel and Google Sheets? Get Instant Expert Help in Fiverr or PeoplePerHour platforms. Click one icon below.
[![Get Instant Expert Help on Fiverr](https://images.hive.blog/DQmfAqRq3mZ42YqnphxXRpKMtfG15eLf79gEDK6dibsByyE/image.png)](https://www.fiverr.com/share/ey8E6m "Excel Expert Help") [![Get Instant Expert Help in PeoplePerHour](https://images.hive.blog/DQmctPstE9Xkp5drV9aKguRA8guU5rbCTvVSSBZGo3r36be/image.png)](https://www.peopleperhour.com/hourlie/give-instant-expert-help-with-excel-and-google-sheets/712968?ref=member "Google Sheets Help")
We can also accept [LEO](https://leofinance.io/@leoglossary/leoglossary-leo "LEO crypto token"), [HIVE](https://leofinance.io/@leoglossary/leoglossary-usdhive "HIVE crypto token"), [HBD](https://leofinance.io/@leoglossary/leoglossary-hive-backed-dollar-hbd "HBD Hive backed dollar") tokens as payment if we transact directly here in HIVE network. Please follow @adaezeinchrist because she organized a gathering for widows and less privileged individuals, providing them with food and clothes in Nigeria

author: gr33nm4ster
root_title: Opening 12 Packs on Rising Star Game 20/06/24 *3Short Video
body:

![opening booster pack.png](https://files.peakd.com/file/peakd-hive/gr33nm4ster/241tpPVwosAYD7kzbTiCAmkgnBwHotP35KmuGb3qRPAmzAoMAZeUCBc5in9CDVSdRFCvy.png)

Opening 12 Packs Rising Star

> Tremendous opening of envelopes, don't miss it, I got from epics to means of transport that have waves of fans that come to improve my stats that are already improving day by day. > Among the cards that have fallen to me is the special e season that is necessary to make the special mission to have a chance to win the other special cards of instruments. > I hope you enjoy this short video in 3short format for the convenience of the viewer and not having to waste time with long and cumbersome intros, 1:20 min of pure luck and envelopes in this video. > If you are interested in starting in the game @risingstargame I leave you my referral link and I am at your disposal in the comments for any questions on its operation. https://www.risingstargame.com?referrer=gr33nm4ster Translated with DeepL.com (free version) Tremenda apertura de sobres, no te la pierdas, me han tocado desde épicas hasta medios de transporte que tienen oleadas de fans que vienen a mejorar mis estadísticas que ya van mejorando día a día. Entre las cartas que me han caído esta la especial e temporada que es necesaria para hacer la misión especial para poder tener oportunidad de ganar las demás cartas especiales de instrumentos. Espero disfrutes este video corto en formato 3short para mayor comodidad de l espectador y no tener que perder tiempo con intros largas y engorrosas, 1:20 min de pura suerte y sobres en este vídeo. Si te interesa iniciar en el juego de @risingstargame te dejo mi link de referido y estoy a tus ordenes en los comentarios por cualquier duda en su funcionamiento. https://www.risingstargame.com?referrer=gr33nm4ster

author: advertisingbot2
body:
Hello everyone who wants to earn some small money,

here I announce the next advertising contest for week 25 from sponsor @achimmertens, period: 2024-06-21 to 2024-06-27.

![Earn Money(2).png](https://files.peakd.com/file/peakd-hive/achimmertens/AKAr2pK3Nw7DhpREEcx2yQ1dSe3BQ4KKDFLKAWjNL9Ni952afaaKuqX68gTapsB.png)

---

![grafik.png](https://files.peakd.com/file/peakd-hive/advertisingbot2/23zbKpafXUuXqcgN1UqE4ELLLjBk6HWR7VCHXMBWeuuhHvjVr9V26Vu632H51AX3QEB1Q.png)

## Advertising Text:
**"Please follow @adaezeinchrist because she organized a gathering for widows and less privileged individuals, providing them with food and clothes in Nigeria"**

![grafik.png](https://files.peakd.com/file/peakd-hive/advertisingbot2/EpnDF7XjUzRvHbukYSaPzgLofEeP2bKekjBmuA9oo8mHW8BAv1i1sGfdg5fHShUuuSn.png)

Gloria Amuche Edwin writes about her family, educational background, occupation, hobbies, and why she is drawn to the Hive community. She expresses her excitement to be a part of the platform and her goals to grow, share unique content, and engage with other members.


# The Reward

The first 10 Hive users, that do this, will get 2.000 Hive each short after the end of the campaign.


# Does it work?
Yes. We did it before. Here is the proof:

* https://peakd.com/hive-154303/@advertisingbot2/winners-of-the-hive-marketing-campaign-240322-week-12-for-mukadder 
* https://peakd.com/advertising/@advertisingbot2/winners-of-the-hive-marketing-campaign-23120401 
* https://peakd.com/hive-154303/@advertisingbot2/winners-of-marketing-campaing-23111001
* https://peakd.com/hive-154303/@advertisingbot2/winners-of-the-advertising-contest-from-last-week
* https://peakd.com/hive-154303/@advertisingbot2/winners-of-the-hive-marketing-campaign-240517-week-20-for-mahirabdullah

![grafik.png](https://files.peakd.com/file/peakd-hive/advertisingbot2/23vrtfBe9soddee9UwH688PMyJYa2GjTPDpiV9s9mAwMHwp7AWurWJanpDDMtpQJx9z89.png)

![grafik.png](https://files.peakd.com/file/peakd-hive/achimmertens/23wghGTaUFS6SsidPJ6d5QqyM3cxpzSj2PMQ8r2XZSWHeBAi2jC4e7JdmyTWL8DbtYTpc.png)

# Inviting Former Members
Hi @barbyjr, @luisfe, @azabache2021, @sayury, @lunafrances, @elioe, @orlandobello, @oasiskp2, @cashheaven, @fjworld, @rubyjosleidy27, @carmencitavdc, @adaezeinchrist, @dodokan, @carmenrivas, @hildemaroflores, @konchix, @gr33nm4ster,
what do you think? Do you want to join the campaign again?

# Status of this project

In the last weeks I have been working on a concept, how to find charity posts more efficiently. I made a little progress with my local AI bot.

---

![Questions.png](https://files.peakd.com/file/peakd-hive/achimmertens/AKKRqJt1qnuNodPEACGiuC9iauEfvSWwo3w9ACbwELDzPg5VpvwJCsfsA8ptwYH.png)

*[origin of some images](https://photofunia.com/)*
